### **Title:  Heavy Harrow Tender Announcement**

### **Reference Number:** WS4291003389-Doc4352401459

#### **Publication Date:** December 14, 2023
#### **Tender Closing Date:** January 15, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

This is a notice to solicit offers for the supply and delivery of a heavy harrow. The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services, invites eligible contractors to submit offers for the procurement.

**Background**
A previous solicitation for offers, WS4291003389, dated December 13, 2023, has been canceled and superseded by this new solicitation. All contractors who submitted offers under the previous notice are eligible to participate in this new opportunity.

**Goods and Services Required**
The Government of Canada requires a heavy harrow for use in agriculture and forestry, conforming to the specifications detailed in the performance description of this notice.

**Selection Criteria**
The selection of the successful contractor will be based on the lowest price.

**Procurement Details**

* Tender Method: Competitive and Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta

**Contact Information**
For all inquiries and submissions, please refer to the following contact information:
Contact: Ashley Tegart
Email: [ashley.tegart@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ashley.tegart@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Telephone: None
Fax: None

**Notice URL**
The full notice can be accessed on Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18283393?extsite=MTgyODMzOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18283393?extsite=MTgyODMzOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### **Important Notice**
Please disregard the closing time displayed on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys postings. All bids must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on January 15, 2024. Late bids will not be considered.

**Submission Requirements**
All contractors are required to submit the supporting documentation and the bid submission electronically. The contractor must ensure that their bid submission includes all required attachments. Failure to do so will result in non-responsiveness.
